parent.title: Additional Invitation Box
parent.description: 1 x Lapland UK invitation box is already included in your booking. You can now buy additional boxes so that each child has one 'chilled' invitation experience.

parent.title: Additional Invitation Box
parent.description:
Your booking includes one Lapland invitation box which will house all of your invitations.
For maximum enjoyment, you can now buy additional boxes so that each child has their own invitation box.
These boxes are a beautiful souvenir that can be filled with Lapland and Christmas memories for years to come.

parent.title: Elf Jingles
parent.description:
Our Elven Currency.
Buy your Jingles now so you are all set for your visit.
Now you too can spend Jingles in Lapland’s shops and restaurants just like the Elves!
Our own Elven currency is £1 per Jingle.
You will be handed your Jingles in a charming red velvet purse upon arrival to Lapland.

parent.title: Cancellation protection
parent.description: IMPORTANT- PLEASE READ Tickets to LaplandUK are non-refundable. Immediately after placing a booking you will have a 14-day ‘cooling off’ window, during which you are entitled to cancel your booking and receive a full refund. Once the 14-day ‘cooling off’ window has passed, our ticking terms and conditions apply, and you will not be able to obtain a refund or transfer your tickets to another season or family. TicketPlan Cancellation Protection is available for your booking. We strongly recommend you include this option. TicketPlan protects your booking if you are unable to attend because of accidents and unexpected illnesses, including if you or a member of your family is too ill to attend the event due to COVID-19. In all instances, suitable supporting evidence will need to be provided, details of which can be found HERE. Please note your booking will not be covered by TicketPlan Cancellation Protection if you are unable to attend the event due to a pre-existing illness. Tickets will only be refundable for COVID-19 related illness if they are also booked with TicketPlan Cancellation Protection. Full details are included in the TicketPlan terms and conditions HERE which we advise you to read and retain. By purchasing Cancellation Protection, your tickets are refundable subject to the terms and conditions of TicketPlan. Please note LaplandUK are not involved in the refund process and are unable to intervene in individual refund applications. The Cancellation Protection fee is non-refundable under any circumstances, this includes cancellation of the event. The booking fee attached to your booking is also non-refundable under any circumstances, including cancellation of the event. Please note your booking will not be covered if LaplandUK is open, but you are unable to attend the event due to government restrictions or similar circumstances outside of our control, including those related to COVID-19. Booking refund protection is a service offered by LaplandUK and administered by TicketPlan on their behalf, it is not an insurance policy. TicketPlan Cancellation Protection can only be purchased at the time of booking, you are unable to add it to your booking retrospectively.

Buy your Jingles now so you are all set for your visit.
Now you too can spend Jingles in Lapland’s shops and restaurants just like the Elves!
Our own Elven currency is £1 per Jingle.
You will be handed your Jingles in a charming red velvet purse upon arrival to Lapland.

parent.title: Additional Invitation Box
parent.description:
Your booking includes one Lapland invitation box which will house all of your invitations.
For maximum enjoyment, you can now buy additional boxes so that each child has their own invitation box.
These boxes are a beautiful souvenir that can be filled with Lapland and Christmas memories for years to come.

parent.title: Cancellation protection
parent.description: IMPORTANT- PLEASE READ Tickets to LaplandUK are non-refundable. Immediately after placing a booking you will have a 14-day ‘cooling off’ window, during which you are entitled to cancel your booking and receive a full refund. Once the 14-day ‘cooling off’ window has passed, our ticking terms and conditions apply, and you will not be able to obtain a refund or transfer your tickets to another season or family. TicketPlan Cancellation Protection is available for your booking. We strongly recommend you include this option. TicketPlan protects your booking if you are unable to attend because of accidents and unexpected illnesses, including if you or a member of your family is too ill to attend the event due to COVID-19. In all instances, suitable supporting evidence will need to be provided, details of which can be found HERE. Please note your booking will not be covered by TicketPlan Cancellation Protection if you are unable to attend the event due to a pre-existing illness. Tickets will only be refundable for COVID-19 related illness if they are also booked with TicketPlan Cancellation Protection. Full details are included in the TicketPlan terms and conditions HERE which we advise you to read and retain. By purchasing Cancellation Protection, your tickets are refundable subject to the terms and conditions of TicketPlan. Please note LaplandUK are not involved in the refund process and are unable to intervene in individual refund applications. The Cancellation Protection fee is non-refundable under any circumstances, this includes cancellation of the event. The booking fee attached to your booking is also non-refundable under any circumstances, including cancellation of the event. Please note your booking will not be covered if LaplandUK is open, but you are unable to attend the event due to government restrictions or similar circumstances outside of our control, including those related to COVID-19. Booking refund protection is a service offered by LaplandUK and administered by TicketPlan on their behalf, it is not an insurance policy. TicketPlan Cancellation Protection can only be purchased at the time of booking, you are unable to add it to your booking retrospectively.

parent.title: Cancellation protection
parent.description: IMPORTANT- PLEASE READ Tickets to LaplandUK are non-refundable. Immediately after placing a booking you will have a 14-day ‘cooling off’ window, during which you are entitled to cancel your booking and receive a full refund. Once the 14-day ‘cooling off’ window has passed, our ticking terms and conditions apply, and you will not be able to obtain a refund or transfer your tickets to another season or family. TicketPlan Cancellation Protection is available for your booking. We strongly recommend you include this option. TicketPlan protects your booking if you are unable to attend because of accidents and unexpected illnesses, including if you or a member of your family is too ill to attend the event due to COVID-19. In all instances, suitable supporting evidence will need to be provided, details of which can be found HERE. Please note your booking will not be covered by TicketPlan Cancellation Protection if you are unable to attend the event due to a pre-existing illness. Tickets will only be refundable for COVID-19 related illness if they are also booked with TicketPlan Cancellation Protection. Full details are included in the TicketPlan terms and conditions HERE which we advise you to read and retain. By purchasing Cancellation Protection, your tickets are refundable subject to the terms and conditions of TicketPlan. Please note LaplandUK are not involved in the refund process and are unable to intervene in individual refund applications. The Cancellation Protection fee is non-refundable under any circumstances, this includes cancellation of the event. The booking fee attached to your booking is also non-refundable under any circumstances, including cancellation of the event. Please note your booking will not be covered if LaplandUK is open, but you are unable to attend the event due to government restrictions or similar circumstances outside of our control, including those related to COVID-19. Booking refund protection is a service offered by LaplandUK and administered by TicketPlan on their behalf, it is not an insurance policy. TicketPlan Cancellation Protection can only be purchased at the time of booking, you are unable to add it to your booking retrospectively.
